title: IDN Font
content:
Thanks a lot for helping me to identify this font often used in the idn-magazine. Maybe you know fonts which are similiar...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_9877.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831152918/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_9877.jpg) | 101.85 KB |
author: ginagrandiosa

comments.content: This is a free font called [Digital Kauno](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831152918/http:/www.dafont.com/digital-kauno.font) - there was a period when every graphic design student used it.
